content.description: This is a short face climb, with some good footholds. The crux (well protected) is one third way up, before the second bolt. Good warmup.
content.protection: Three bolts. Two bolts anchor on top.
content.location: First bolt line on the left of Rat Race

content.description: Head up a crack, pass a tree into a left-facing corner beneath a big roof.  Place a couple of pieces in the lip, then reach up to the hidden hold and stem over the roof.  Jamming skills useful here.  The roof looks hard but is actually not so bad if you get the sequence right.  Bolt anchor at the top with rings.
content.protection: The books say pro to 4-5", but #2 / 0.75 camalots fit in the lip just fine.  Perhaps some mid-sized nuts if you really want to sew it up.  Long sling for the tree.
content.location:
Take the Moses Spring trail from the parking lot, and turn right at the Tourist Trap sign; scramble down and then back up.  Last year a lot of work was done in this area and there are new stone steps.  There is a tree near the base which makes a good belay anchor.

Descend by rappel.

climbs.name: Thrill Hammer
climbs.fa: Tim Reid, Eric Topel, David Rubine, 10/1990

content.description:
Kind of a steep start.  I thought the crux was between the first and second bolt.

After the sixth bolt there are some small cracks.  Either place some pro here and head up over the "summit block" (5.7) variation to the anchors (bolts with rings) or traverse right (5.6).
content.protection: Six quickdraws; cams in the 0.5 - 0.7" range if taking the 5.7 "summit block" variation
content.location:
First bolted route to the right of Rat Race.

Descend by rappel.

content.description: Nice face climb to the left of Thrill Hammer featuring a fun flake.
content.protection: Set up top rope on Thrill Hammer or Pastie. Shares anchor with Thrill hammer and Pastie.
content.location: Starts with two sidepulls to the left of Thrill Hammer, just right of a tree. Move up to a large flake. Reach the first ledge and finish on the same route as Thrill Hammer. Rap down.

content.description: Begin 10 feet left of Rat Race.  Face climb past a single Star Dryvin bolt (origin unknown), then continue straight up and through the intimidating roof above to finish at the Rat Race anchors.
A nice protectable flake.  A combination of laybacking and crack moves can be used here.  Turns into a face as you get higher up.
content.protection: Standard Rack, shares the bolted anchor with Pickpocket.

content.description: Climb past two bolts and traverse to the crack on the right. Clip two bolts on the arete, traverse to the other side of the arete. Climb past three bolts to the anchor. As you approach Angstroms, the arete is visible above and behind the main Tourist Trap wall. Surprisingly dynamic for .11b.
content.location: Starts on the slab directly behind and facing the same direction as Angstroms Away. Start just left of the small tree.

content.description: Nice easy, [mainly] crack climb to the right of Thrill Hammer.
content.protection: Standard Pinnacles rack.  Shares an anchor with Thrill Hammer.
content.location: From the base of Thrill Hammer you can't miss this...it's the crack on your right.  At the large tree continue straight up.

climbs.name: The Long and The Short of It
climbs.fa: Gavin Emmons, Kyle Queener, Brad Young, October 27, 2014

content.description: This climb begins on the Tourist Trap's midway ledge, 25 feet right of the two bolts found halfway up Nipple Jam.  Start in an up-and-left hand crack.  This leads 15 feet to a roof (gear to 1 ½ inches).  Make one move up the roof to the first bolt (reachy).  Three more bolts protect climbing up and generally right to a shallow corner.  Move up the corner past one more bolt to a two-bolt anchor, 55 feet from the start of the route.
content.protection: Gear to 1 ½ inches and five bolts.
content.location: The far right side of The Tourist Trap.

content.description: Climb just right of the arete at the farthest left of the Tourist Trap formation.
content.protection: Two bolts to a two-bolt anchor.
content.location: Located just right of the left edge of the Tourist Trap formation.
